venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center

item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Microsoft New England, 1 Memorial Drive, Kendall Square Cambridge, in the Adams and Attucks rooms

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:15: 1 Min or less Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest  
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:15-7:45 Guest Speaker Presentation - Paid Links: A look at the Truth and the Disinformation

Presented by Text Link Ads

  • Search Engine Webmaster Guidelines
  • What SEOs have to say about paid Links
  • Link Penalties and Filter
  • Search Engine FUD
  • Do Paid Links Work?
  • Kinds of Paid Links

Text-Link-Ads is based in New York and is one of the oldest and largest link companies.

This should be a hot one, and we are assured that this presentation is NOT a pitch for TLA!

7:45 - 8:15 Open Internet Marketing Round Table Discussion

Experts will share specific advice in an open discussion. We open up the discussion to possibly expand on other topics beyond the presentation.

8:15 to 8:30 Open Challenge Questions

Time to get advice to help fellow internet marketers.

8:30pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

----------------------------------  
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: SEO Meetup
